identified-content.object.title: Disney/Pixar's Buzz Lightyear of Star Command (TV Program)
identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Media, Entertainment and Publishing

abstract.p: Television program Disney/Pixar's Buzz Lightyear of Star Command, animated series for children, noted; photo (S)

block.p: Buzz Lightyear, the lantern-jawed hero of the ''Toy Story'' films, battles intergalactic evildoers in his own animated action comedy series, ''Disney/Pixar's Buzz Lightyear of Star Command,'' beginning tomorrow on Channel 9, where it will be shown weekdays at 7 a.m. and Sundays at 10:30 a.m. Saturday broadcasts begin Oct. 14 at 10:30 a.m. on ABC.

Buzz Lightyear, the lantern-jawed hero of the ''Toy Story'' films, battles intergalactic evildoers in his own animated action comedy series, ''Disney/Pixar's Buzz Lightyear of Star Command,'' beginning tomorrow on Channel 9, where it will be shown weekdays at 7 a.m. and Sundays at 10:30 a.m. Saturday broadcasts begin Oct. 14 at 10:30 a.m. on ABC.
